channel.title: [Needing Assistance] NPC damage
channel.description:
Hey guys, Im OMG its NICK, I am currently coding my own server GoScape and when I say coding, no I'm not leeching and changing a few things, actually doing the good stuff =P. And I havent figured this one out yet, How to make NPC's do less damage or more damage. I need to get this done to be that one step closer to finishing my server. So, if you guys can help, I'd appericate it.
*Sorry about any grammar or spelling errors. Kind of tired.
